note.p: Cloth waterproofer, farmer, and horse breeder. Ran a clothworking business in Peters Hill, London. Farmer on Bromley Common, Kent, 1861; in Sydenham, Kent, 1871, 1881.
CD’s Address book (English Heritage, Down House)
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/463/152/11), 1871 (RG10/773/86/45), 1881 (RG11/739/100/25)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 27 July 2017)
Post Office directory of the six home counties 1862
